title: Claimant employment dates
p1: It may help the tribunal if you can provide these details. You will not be penalised for not providing them.

provideInfoAboutEmploymentDates.label: Do you want to provide any further information about the claimant's employment dates? (optional)

employmentStartDate.dayNotANumber: Enter a date in the correct format
employmentStartDate.monthNotANumber: Enter a date in the correct format
employmentStartDate.yearNotANumber: Enter a date in the correct format

employmentStartDate.monthRequired: Enter a date in the correct format
employmentStartDate.yearRequired: Enter a date in the correct format
employmentStartDate.dayInvalid: Enter a date in the correct format
employmentStartDate.monthInvalid: Enter a date in the correct format
employmentStartDate.yearInvalid: Enter a date in the correct format
employmentStartDate.invalidDateTooFarInPast: Enter a date in the correct format
employmentStartDate.invalidDate: Enter a date in the correct format
employmentStartDate.invalidDateInFuture: Enter a date in the past
